thread.section_title: Hardware Source Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hardware Source | www.hardwaresource.com | 5 of 370
thread.title: Doug S.
thread.title_full: Hardware Source reviewed by Doug S.

author: Doug S.
title: Doug S.
text: I have been looking all over, for a hinge for my kitchen cabinet door. The cabinets where installed in the 80s and where in great shape. Found Hardware Source. They had the exact hinge. Didn't have to change cabinets. Great people at Hardware Source. Sent them a photo of the hinge I needed via email . With in 2 hours they got back to me with the link and part I needed. Fit like a glove. Give them 10 stars.
